Class BufferedIODemon

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Client, ThreadServer
public abstract class BufferedIODemon
extends Demon

Rappresenta un demone, il quale possiede un socket, e gli stream di input/output.

Author:
Simone Spaccarotella
